1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/UncleSamSwiss/ioBroker.luxtronik2/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

2004.issue: [E2004] Versions "0.0.2, 0.0.1" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/UncleSamSwiss/ioBroker.luxtronik2/blob/master/io-package.json) do not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.luxtronik2). Please remove from news section.

5013.issue: [W5013] "gulpfile.js" found in repo! Think about migrating to @iobroker/adapter-dev package

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '12.0' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/UncleSamSwiss/ioBroker.luxtronik2/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 2.5.1 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/UncleSamSwiss/ioBroker.luxtronik2/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @iobroker/testing 2.6.0 specified. 4.1.3 is required as minimum,  5.2.2 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/UncleSamSwiss/ioBroker.luxtronik2/blob/master/package.json)
